title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent javafile icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing java file. 
2) Modify the file (e.g., move an existing class). 
3) Click the SaveAs icon next to the Save Icon. A dialog will appear. 
4) Browse for a valid container location. 
5) Type the filename without the extension as it is not requested. 
6) Click OK. 

Observed Behavior: The file is added to the specified location in the Navigator, but no file extension is shown.
EB: Expected Behavior: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original file unless explicitly changed.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1) Open an existing java file. 
2) Modify the file. 
3) Click the SaveAs icon next to the Save Icon and a dialog should appear. 
4) Browse for a valid container location and select it. 
5) Type the desired filename without the extension. 
6) Click OK. 

The file should be saved with the same extension as the original file unless explicitly changed.
